column1: #text=I needed to learn about gardening and was n't sure where to start .
#text=A friend of mine recommended a book .
#text=I decided to check it out from the local library .
#text=Inside there was a computer to look up where books are located .
#text=I typed in the name of the book I was looking for and it showed me the call number , a unique number used to tell where the book is located in the library .
#text=I wrote the call number down and looked at the stacks of books .
#text=Each stack had a range of numbers printed on a card taped to the side of the bookshelf .
#text=I looked for my call number on the printed cards on the side of the bookshelves , then searched the books until I found the one I was looking for .
#text=I brought the book up to the front of the library .
#text=The librarian took my library card and scanned it and my book with a special scanner .
#text=She gave me a piece of paper inside the book that said I needed to bring it back within 2 weeks .
#text=I brought the book home and read it , then brought it back to the librarian .
